Package gov.sandia.cognition.learning.performance.categorization

Provides performance measures for categorizers.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BinaryConfusionMatrix
    An interface for a binary confusion matrix.
    ConfusionMatrix<CategoryType>
    An interface for a general confusion matrix, which is used to tabulate a set of actual category values against the values predicted for those categories.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractBinaryConfusionMatrix
    An abstract implementation of the BinaryConfusionMatrix interface.
    AbstractConfusionMatrix<CategoryType>
    An abstract implementation of the ConfusionMatrix interface.
    ConfusionMatrixPerformanceEvaluator<InputType,CategoryType>
    A performance evaluator that builds a confusion matrix.
    DefaultBinaryConfusionMatrix
    A default implementation of the BinaryConfusionMatrix.
    DefaultBinaryConfusionMatrix.ActualPredictedPairSummarizer
    A confusion matrix summarizer that summarizes actual-predicted pairs.
    DefaultBinaryConfusionMatrix.CombineSummarizer
    A confusion matrix summarizer that adds together confusion matrices.
    DefaultBinaryConfusionMatrix.PerformanceEvaluator<InputType>
    An implementation of the SupervisedPerformanceEvaluator interface for creating a DefaultBinaryConfusionMatrix.
    DefaultBinaryConfusionMatrixConfidenceInterval
    Puts Student-t ConfidenceIntervals on each entry of the ConfusionMatrix
    DefaultBinaryConfusionMatrixConfidenceInterval.Summary
    An implementation of the Summarizer interface for creating a ConfusionMatrixInterval
    DefaultConfusionMatrix<CategoryType>
    A default implementation of the ConfusionMatrix interface.
    DefaultConfusionMatrix.ActualPredictedPairSummarizer<CategoryType>
    A confusion matrix summarizer that summarizes actual-predicted pairs.
    DefaultConfusionMatrix.CombineSummarizer<CategoryType>
    A confusion matrix summarizer that adds together confusion matrices.
    DefaultConfusionMatrix.Factory<CategoryType>
    A factory for default confusion matrices.

Package gov.sandia.cognition.learning.performance.categorization Description

Provides performance measures for categorizers.
Since:
3.1
Author:
Justin Basilico
